headline: Teledyne Acquires DD-Scientific
summary: THOUSAND OAKS, Calif., January 14, 2026--Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) ("Teledyne") announced today the acquisition of DD-Scientific Holdings Limited and its subsidiary DD-Scientific Limited. DD-Scientific, founded in 2011 and headquartered in Fareham, United Kingdom, develops and manufactures high-performance gas sensors for critical applications in industries that demand absolute accuracy. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
